abstract: President Obama kicks off three-day tour of North Carolina and Virginia, both states he carried in 2008 but are likely to pose greater challenges in 2012.
snippet: President Obama kicked off a three-day tour of North Carolina and Virginia, both states he carried in 2008. This time, he faces a greater challenge.
lead_paragraph: President Obama kicked off a three-day tour of North Carolina and Virginia, both states he carried in 2008. This time, he faces a greater challenge.

headline.main: Looking Toward 2012, Obama Finds North Carolina Less Receptive
headline.print_headline: Looking Toward 2012, Obama Finds North Carolina Less Receptive
headline.seo: Obama Finds a Less Receptive North Carolina
